name: Strawberry-Banana Fritters
author: gina
summary: My grandmother made these crispy, fruity treats with apples, and my mother with sweet corn. When I didn't have either on hand, I substituted bananas and strawberries. Serve dusted with confectioners' sugar.
ingredients: ¼ cup vegetable oil for frying
directions: Sift flour, baking powder, cinnamon, and salt together in a bowl
Whisk eggs and confectioners' sugar together in a large bowl
Add milk, 1 teaspoon oil, and vanilla extract; mix well to combine
Add flour mixture; stir until just combined
Gently fold bananas and strawberries into batter
Heat 1/4 cup oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat
Scoop 1/4 cup batter at a time into the oil and fry fritters, in batches, until light golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes per side
